title: r/AmITheA**hole A Kid Found My Pot Cookies!
description:
r/AmITheA**hole In today's episode, OP baked himself a batch of special cookies for his own enjoyment. It's worth pointing out that where he lives, these cookies are totally legal! Well, OP's family member shows up unexpectedly with their young child, and immediately the child runs into the kitchen to grab the cookie. Luckily, OP was able to stop the child before she ate a cookie, but her parents were furious with OP. Is he the butthole? If you like this podcast and want to see more, follow my podcast for more daily Reddit content!
